Posts.Content: thank you had a phone call from chemo nurse.she said it was ok to take parcetemol and use bonjjela.am thinking it might be just a ulcer because it does`nt hurt if abcess it would.will.what`s it`s like tomorrow if hurts will go to dentist and stay untill someone will see me and give me some difflam.chemo nurse sais it` would be better not going as day 7 white cell count going down.and you don`t want a dentist poking and probing which might cause a infection can you get difflem at your dentist
Posts.Title: teeth

Posts.Content: can any body tell me when it`s a good time to have any dental work done,.whent to dentist before the chemo started.cheecked teeeth said would be fine as long as flossed and used mouthwash,.which i have been doing.now think i might have a ulcer on my gum can`t see said dentist for 2 wks.told her doingÂ  chemo but said was fully booked !!!!!!!!!!!!! .think it`s ok to take paracetmol+ bonjela.wanted to know anybody in same boat xx
Posts.Title: teeth

Posts.Content: afternoon .enough is enough the night time fairies have past me yet again.so rang up the doc`s.he came to see ,very nice explained that sleeping was a problem.fed up going to bed feeling very tierd (can`t keep eye`s open) going to sleep and wake up feeling that have been asleep for hours infact only 2 then, counting down the hours untill time to get up .have tryed all the stuff like reading/making cp of tea/etc.but he gave me some temazepam (i know they are addictive but so is chocolate)best night sleep iv`e had ,am not going to take them every night but now and again should be ok .just thought i`d share my experiance with you all x PS if mother nature has got some that`s like please let me know
Posts.Title: sleep

Posts.Content: thank you.did`nt take any temazepam last night! ,big mistake but i don`t want to start to reley on them.have got some kalms (night) to try tonight.have had 2 lots of chemo and 4 more to go then 4 wks of rads.so am sure i will have to take more.am so jelaous of ladies who can sleep at a drop of a hat .hope alls well with you and your mum.good luck and have a good x
